text:

I have done radio in: New York, Kansas, California, Texas, Oregon, Philly, Georgia, and Ohio. I have done Hip Hop, Rock, and Talk. I have also been syndicated and I have been fired! I also worked on "The Howard Stern Show" for a bit. I also like girls, but money can change my mind. Contact
